data.name: Ocean of Emptiness
data.detailed_description:
Ocean of emptiness is a fps game about an astronaut stranded on a spaceship. You must operate four buttons to defend your ship from the oncoming hordes of enemies that await you. Each Button corresponds to a gun on the side of your ship, you must use these guns to destroy enemy's that you will be able to see on the screen in front of you.

The only movement you have is being able to look around your ship, but you are not able to walk around it. The goal of the game is to survive for ten days until the company you work for is able to send help. Every day the enemies evolve and have a new ability - speed, higher spawn rates, etc. I hope you wish to try out Oceans of Emptiness and I bid you farewell.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: After your ship was struck by an asteroid you are left stranded in the depths of space. You must survive what lurks in the abyss until help is able to reach you in this horror precision clicker fps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 70 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1660
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
